testcase.classname: Test search result in Question page
testcase.name: Search for a non existent question
testcase.system-out: Given user is in the Question page..........................................passed And types in the search field "Science: Computers"..........................passed When user clicks the search button..........................................passed Then an error message is returned with "No question found.".................passed

testcase.classname: Test search result in Question page
testcase.name: Search question and the results have pagination control
testcase.system-out: Given user is in the Question page..........................................passed And types in the search field "Science: Computers"..........................passed And select a search option per category.....................................passed When user clicks the search button..........................................passed Then it is displayed 25 elements in the current page........................passed Then at bottom of page there are other pages buttons and next button........passed

testcase.classname: Test search result in Question page
testcase.name: Search question and pagination control does not have previous page '<'
testcase.system-out: Given user is in the Question page..........................................passed And types in the search field "Science: Computers"..........................passed And select a search option per category.....................................passed When user clicks the search button..........................................passed Then it is displayed 25 elements in the current page........................passed Then current results is presented at page 1.................................passed Then the previous page '<' is not displayed before page 1...................passed
